responses.content: 5 NPCs resolved. (1) Lithoe@Khuzdukan: rests one full day per Thoron's order, then begins sending network construction — first resonance calibration tests using ward-chamber acoustics. (2) Lalholm@Khuzdukan: conducts Haadis communion at upper terrace near Dwarven Gate — sunlight access critical for divine contact. Attempts preliminary soul-assessment of wardens Grull and Torvash. (3) Castellan Joppa@Vornost: receives second raven from frontier (Bale's report on Vasha execution and new command structure). Begins preparing Black Fortress garrison for potential Helkar arrival. (4) Ironmask Agent Deryth@Caras: cultivating Conorth's secretary — second meeting at the Copper Cup tavern. Building trust, probing Conorth's reaction to frontier reports. (5) Harren Vael@Riverwatch: reviews customs ledger discrepancy evidence. Drafts formal complaint to Vornost regarding Golden Hind stamp anomalies. Courier dispatched.
